Looking for more?

Jump to additional reports below, or email libassess@virginia.edu if we can help!

Library Surveys

A selection of assessment information is available below. The User Survey takes place each Spring, and surveys a selection of faculty and students to identify trends in service satisfaction and use and areas for improvement.

2019 Library User Survey Results

  • Report of Faculty results
  • Report of Graduate student results
  • Report of Undergraduate student results

Previous Survey Results

  • 2018 User Survey (PDFs): Faculty | Graduate Students | Undergraduates
  • 2017 User Survey (PDF)

If you need older materials or can't find what you need, send an email to libassess@virginia.edu and we'll be happy to help. Previous years available upon request.

Association of Research Library Statistics

Library statistics are gathered year-round for planning and analysis, and for reporting to professional groups such as the Association of Research Libraries (ARL).

The data cover statistics about our collections, services, spaces, staffing, and finances.

  • Association of Research Libraries Statistics 2018/2019
